DOC.brief_summary: Present practice : Measurement fast glucose value 2nd trimester pregnancy , 4.8 mmol/l , Glucose Tolerance Test perform . ( Two-step procedure : 1 . Appointment fast glucose measurement , 2 . Appointment Glucose Tolerance Test )
DOC.brief_title: Testing Ascensia Contour Glucometer Measurement Blood Glucose
DOC.detailed_description: Present practice : Measurement fast glucose value 2nd trimester pregnancy , 4.8 mmol/l , Glucose Tolerance Test perform . ( Two-step procedure : 1 . Appointment fast glucose measurement , 2 . Appointment Glucose Tolerance Test ) Study : Testing reliability applicability Ascensia Contour Glucometer , Bayer . Comparison 100 fast glucose value measure venous plasma hexokinase method Laboratory 100 fast glucose value measure capillary whole blood Ascensia Contour Glucometer Outcome : If Ascensia Contour Glucometer show applicable accuracy ( narrow scatter value ) , two-step procedure replace one-step procedure : 1 one appointment measurement fast glucose value capillary whole blood Ascensia Contour Glucometer 4.8 mmol/l Glucose Tolerance Test day
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy pregnant woman 2nd Trimester pregnancy schedule measurement fast glucose value Exclusion criterion : Pregnant woman preexistent ( Type 1 2 ) diabetes already diagnose diabetes pregnancy
